name: Spaghetti al Pomodoro
description: A simple, authentic Italian tomato spaghetti recipe.
recipeIngredient: 500g ripe tomatoes or canned San Marzano tomatoes
A handful of fresh basil leaves

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook spaghetti until al dente.
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and sauté until golden.
Crush tomatoes and add to skillet. Season with salt and pepper. Simmer for 10–15 minutes.
Drain spaghetti, reserving a little pasta water.
Toss spaghetti in sauce, adding pasta water if needed.
Serve with basil and Parmigiano-Reggiano if desired.
